summary: A new player home located pretty near Riften for you and your family. Supports Hearthfire adoption up to 6 kids
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][u][color=#40e0d0][size=5][b]Riften Sanctuary[/b][/size][/color][/u][/font]
 [/center]
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#800080][size=5][b]- INTRODUCTION -[/b][/size][/color]
 
[color=#ffffff]This is a pretty large player home constructed for your family and probably followers as well.
 
It's inbuilt in a new world space, so your family won't be in the risk of getting slaughtered or chowed on by random enemies. No bandits, no giants, no angry dragons. The Dawnguard or Vigilants may still come invading if you use Better Vampires though.
 
This is a fully functional house, but it won't be overly cluttered. I just prefer it that way. [/color]
 
[size=5][b][color=#800080]- FEATURES -[/color][/b][/size][/font]
[LIST]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Adoption friendly. You can move your entire family here (up to 6 kids), but as always, you [u]MUST[/u] use [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249][color=#add8e6][u]Hearthfire multiple adoptions - Now with custom home support for kids and spouse by TMPhoenix[/u][/color][/url][color=#ffffff].Without his mod, you will not be able to move your family. [/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Armory on the top with 14 mannequins, plenty of weapon plaques and display cases. Should be sufficient to store most of your collection.[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Kitchen with an oven and cooking pot [/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Dining table for 6 urchins[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Children Room with 6 beds and quite a number of toys[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Main bedroom[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Library with plenty of shelves. Book collectors, rejoice![/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Enchanting and Alchemy lab in the basement. A little bedroom for the steward is there as well[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]A male or female steward. Not the best looking NPC around but you can dump your junk to him/her since he/she carries quite an amount of septims[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]An exterior with a waterfall and river[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]A pool and deck area where your kids will sandbox at. [/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Greenhouse, with plantable planters[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Fish Hatchery[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]A steamy jacuzzi pool under a gazebo[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Two Apiaries[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]All the blacksmith stuff. Sharpening wheel, tanning rack, workbench, forge, smelter and a wood chopping block. [/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Animal farm and vegetable farm[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]A horse stable with a horse[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Plenty of markers for the NPC's[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]A German Shepard called Dex. He will be walking around and laying near the pool. Can't get him to have the option be a companion though... so... err.[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Navmeshed by hand and cleaned with TES5Edit.[/color][/font][/*]
[/LIST]
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#800080][b][size=5]- Location -[/size][/b][/color]
 
[color=#ffffff]The entrance (A cave looking entrance) is located north east of Riften. Please refer to my screenie.[/color]
 
[size=5][b][color=#800080]- Known Bugs -[/color][/b][/size]
 
[color=#ffffff]I mentioned this above but yeah, Dex doesn't follow you as a follower. He has the speech options but I just can't get him to follow. [i]UPDATE: He does follow if you have Ultimate Follower Overhaul Mod installed[/i]
 
[s]The steward may have a discoloured face. If her face is grey on your games, please download the file on the optional files section. Extract it and put the content into your data folder.[/s]
 
Another steward related issue... err... this woman... lol. For some reason, she doesn't appear in the house as she supposed to. Some of you mentioned that, she's found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun. Trying to fix that currently.
 
[s]For the ones who has installed Falskaar, the entrance for the Sanctuary clashes with the location of where Falskaar's entrance is. I don't have Falskaar so this is an overlook on my side which I apologize for. Gonna release an update quick which I will move the entrance.[/s]  UPDATE: Fixed in Update 1.1 
 
If you find something else, please let me know and I will try my very best to fix any issue you may have.[/color]
 
[b][color=#800080][size=5]- Requirements -[/size][/color][/b]
 
[color=#ffffff]Hearthfire and Dawnguard[/color]
 
 
[b][size=5][color=#800080]- Installation -[/color][/size][/b]
 
[color=#ffffff]Unzip the BSA and the files either from the Male Steward folder or Female Steward folder  into your ... Skyrim/Data folder. Please choose only one.[/color]
 
[b][size=5][color=#800080]- ChangeLog -[/color][/size][/b]
 [/font]
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]1.1 :[/font]
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]- Changed the location of the entrance so it doesn't clash with [/font][color=#ffffff][font=trebuchet ms , helvetica, sans-serif]Falskaar's entrance. [/font][/color][color=#ffffff][font=trebuchet ms , helvetica, sans-serif]Thanks JLF65 for informing me of this major bug.[/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=trebuchet ms , helvetica, sans-serif]- Fixed the bug where the [/font][/color][color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]map marker shows that you are at west of Whiterun[/font][/color]
[color=#ffffff][font=Trebuchet MS , Helvetica, sans-serif]- Did something to the steward. Hopefully he/she doesn't go MIA now...[/font][/color]

[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]1.0.1b Added an optional download for those who prefer a male steward. [i](For you Bowtruckle, LOL)[/i][/color]
[color=#ffffff]1.0.1 Fixed the bookshelves. Thanks collinmacleod for informing me.[/color]
 
[b][size=5][color=#800080]- Permissions and Credits -[/color][/size][/b]
 
[color=#ffffff]Feel free to change whatever you want, but please do not upload to other sites. And if you upload to Nexus, get my permission first.
 
Umm.. there's quite a list who I would I like to thank. If I have missed anyone out, please forgive me Please let me know and I will update the list:
Most of the modders listed below are for meshes and textures except where otherwise marked[/color][/font]
[LIST]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]AARS[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Bond[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Breti[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Insanity[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Lilith[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Merilia[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Oaristy's[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Runspect[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Stroti[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Tamira[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]InsanitySorrow[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Artisanix[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]FPI Research[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Kanra (For the greenhouse walls and sliding doors)[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]MrpDean (For the jacuzzi & the gazebo)[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Last but not least, my really good friend Noxide. Without him, I most probably won't even have the house. Lol. Thanks for all the guidance, tips, literally sorting out my mess and being so patient with me. Mwah! <3[/color][/font][/*]
[/LIST]
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][color=#ffffff]Thanks Bethesda for the game and the Creation Kit.[/color][/font]
 
[font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif][b][size=5][color=#800080]- Sidenote -[/color][/size][/b][/font]
 
[color=#ffffff][font=trebuchet ms,helvetica,sans-serif]This is my first mod which I really really work on, so any comments/constructive criticisms, please say out! Please endorse if you like this mod![/font] :smile:[/color]
author: Vivian
